channel.title: All-Star Base Help
channel.description: Hi, I don't need much help except for the fact that if you guys know all-star or any base servers that work with all star, such as codes and all. Wondering if you guys can throw me some idea's for it. Such as increasing capacity, Mini-games, guides on cool stuff you would like on a server. This is completely all star based so Keep that in mind!
